name: Fowlcard
description:
Description

Fowlcard is a game that combines the genre for card games and simulation(rearing livestock) games. Keep up the number of your fowls as long as you can. Protect them from the predating wolves and snakes.

Instructions

A card is drawn each time the day changes to night or vice versa.

  • Health (♥) - The life points of each animal. When it reaches zero, they dies.
  • Threat (♠) - The amount of damage dealt when attacking (for predators) and counter-attacking (for preys).
  • Nutrient (♣) - The value needed to breed new offspring.
  • Experience (♦) - The value needed to grow/evolve.
Credits

Assets: http://www.kenney.nl/

Music: http://www.purple-planet.com/
